Executive Chef Alex McPhail
email Alex
Team Leader Nathan Delaware
Email Nathan

// CATEGORY NAV
With southern flair and a contemporary twist, the Restaurant IRON dining experience elevates Downtown Pensacola’s culinary offerings to new standard. The theme is locally-sourced, hand-made, and detail-focused for every recipe prepared in our open kitchen and presented by knowledgeable and professional staff in a comfortable, yet elegant, southern-inspired setting.
IRON opened in the Summer of 2012 at Marcus Pointe Golf Club. Initially a lunch-only location, demand quickly called for an expansion to add dinner service, which was added in the Fall. When Marcus Pointe changed management in 2014, it was time for IRON to find a new, more centralized home. In December of 2014, IRON opened at its current location of 22 N Palafox St. in beautiful Downtown Pensacola.
Restaurant IRON has received several awards and much recognition since its inception.  For the last four years, IRON was the recipient of Florida Trend Magazine's Golden Spoon Award. Additionally, the IN Weekly and the Pensacola News Journal have recognized Restaurant IRON for numerous awards in its yearly reader poll, including Best Restaurant in Pensacola. Restaurant IRON has also been recognized over the years by OpenTable, including receiving their Diners’ Choice award and listed as the Top 100 in the Nation in their “Fit for Foodies” category.  Most recently, Restaurant IRON has been recognized by Garden & Gun Magazine and listed by Forbes in their article, "50 Best Southern Restaurants in America” and recognized by OpenTable in their “100 Most Romantic Restaurants in America.”
Restaurant IRON has been recognized in 2022 & 2023 by Wine Spectator Magazine as recipient of their Award of Excellence for our wine program.

// CATEGORY NAV
Contact

Please do not use this form to request reservations.  For reservations, please call us or click on the “Reservations” tab here on our website.
To provide feedback from a recent visit or if you have a general inquiry, please email wecare@restaurantiron.com

Interested in joining the Iron team?
Restaurant Iron is always looking for enthusiastic, creative and passionate individuals who want to join our team, contribute and make a difference. We recognize that our ability to be successful will largely be due to the hard work and dedicated efforts of our staff.
We strive to create a professional work environment built on values, integrity and honesty so that our staff – regardless of position or role – has the opportunity to reach their full potential.
Does this sound like an environment you'd like to work in?  We'd love to have you on our team.
